quiz.question: What is the main source of energy for the Earth?
What is sustainable development?
options: Development that meets the needs of the present without compromising the ability of future generations to meet their own needs
Development that focuses solely on economic growth
Development that is only beneficial for developed countries
quiz.answer: Development that meets the needs of the present without compromising the ability of future generations to meet their own needs

quiz.question: Which of the following is a renewable resource?
